item.title: :: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Gratlofatic Gratlofatic
item.description:
@Gratlofatic wrote:

Hey, guys, I know this has probably been posted before, but…

I was wondering how to make a ‘::’ command.

I dont really know how… at all… and I know there are some mega-coders out there who will know >.<

I already have one called ‘::help’ and this is the code i have for it:

public void ServerHelp() { sendFrame126("@dre@Deducted - Help Menu", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126{"", 8146); sendFrame126("", 8147); sendFrame126("", 8148); sendFrame126("", 8149); sendFrame126("", 8150); sendFrame126("", 8151); sendFrame126("", 8163); sendFrame126("", 8164); sendFrame126("", 8165); sendFrame126("", 8166); sendFrame126("", 8167); sendFrame126("", 8168); sendFrame126("", 8169); sendFrame126("", 8171); sendFrame126("", 8172); sendFrame126("", 8173); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }

All the ’ “” 's are where my text goes in.

Anyway, I was wondering if you could say (ie.) ::train and go to a training place that i made (i know the coords)

so, if someone can tell me a code, and where to put it, that’d be great

Thanks

~
Me
~

Read full topic
